PDM Clock Divider.

Enumerator
CY_PDM_PCM_CLK_DIV_BYPASS 

Clock 1/1.

CY_PDM_PCM_CLK_DIV_1_2 

Clock 1/2 (no 50% duty cycle).

CY_PDM_PCM_CLK_DIV_1_3 

Clock 1/3 (no 50% duty cycle).

CY_PDM_PCM_CLK_DIV_1_4 

Clock 1/4 (no 50% duty cycle).
